text: Stefan Kendal Gordy (born September 3, 1975), better known by his stage name Redfoo, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, dancer, record producer and DJ. He was one-half of the EDM-hip house duo LMFAO, which he formed with his half-nephew Sky Blu in 2006. The duo became best known for their 2011 singles "Party Rock Anthem" (featuring Lauren Bennett and GoonRock) and "Sexy and I Know It," both of which peaked atop the Billboard Hot 100. They signed with will.i.am Music Group, an imprint of Interscope Records to release two studio albums—Party Rock (2009) and Sorry for Party Rocking (2011)—until their disbandment in 2012. Redfoo released his debut solo album, Party Rock Mansion, in 2016. ==Acknowledgments== The first artist to reach 1 million like on YouTube with videoclip Party Rock Anthem on November 15, 2011 (under the pseudonym LMFAO.) ==References== Category:1975 births Category:American record producers Category:American pop singers Category:Living people Category:American songwriters Category:American pop rappers
title: Redfoo
